storyInfo: In a Sarkaz marketplace, the unconventional Crownie catches Nymph's eye. She has fashioned a revenant fragment into a gemstone brooch to go with her suit. Nymph follows her out of the city, and runs into Mostima on a delivery. After improving the design of another suit, Crownie finds she no longer needs the brooch, and gives it to Nymph.

attributes.content: What is it, Ermi?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: How's your progress after two days?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: I've found lots of them! ...Well, okay, just two, actually... But don't you worry, I'll have it all wrapped up in no time! Why, what's the matter?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nothing, really. The old man suddenly remembered this little mission of yours, so he's been pestering me about it.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: We thought these fragments would be causing chaos all over Kazdel, but for the time being, things still seem normal as ever.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Nobody's knocking on the Military Commission's door about it, and we haven't detected any abnormalities either.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: (*whispers*) All thanks to me being the first to run into them, haha...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Basically, feel free to keep going at your own pace.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Is that all?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Yep, that's all. Just remember, safety first. If you run into anything you can't handle, give me a call.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Sure, will do. Thanks, Ermi.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Ermi's thoughtful as ever, even while she works. I should probably pick up the pace.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: So, whaddya want to eat?
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Eh? Oh, sorry, let me have a look.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I'll try this one.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Is this a new recipe?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Just baked dough, same as always. Pretty sure I've seen you eat here before, too.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: But the taste is different, no?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It's chewier than last time. Maybe even a little bit... sweet?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Really? Maybe my ingredients are better this time around.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: More and more folks have been coming back lately, and I got ways to get quality stuff at a lower price. Dough gets nicer, that's a bonus.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Then, do you still need my help negotiating prices?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nah, an old merc customer of mine put me in touch with a better supplier. They've got reasonable prices, and they're a friendly bunch. No need to trouble yourself any longer.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Happy to hear that! Does this mean one day, you could make white bread like they do in Victoria?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You little glutton, what's so great about white bread? Next time you've got time, I'll cook you up some grilled meat.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Really?! Mmm, grilled meat...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Can I have three more buns of the dough to go? I'll eat them on the road.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Sure. Just wait a sec and I'll give you some fresh out the oven.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Hehe, thank you.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hmm-hmm. I've gotten so much done over the last two days, I think I deserve a little treat for myself.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nothing beats a full bellyâ€”
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph glimpses a Sarkaz out the corner of her eye. Not on purpose, of course.
Any passerby would find themselves turning their head. It would be hard not to.
She stands motionless, leaning against her cane, with her top-hatted head held high.
Here, where most are disheveled and scruffy-looking, a woman like her is a rare sight indeed.
Here, your dough.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Eh? Oh, thanks...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: First time laying eyes on her?
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: I don't think I've ever seen anyone quite like... her.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: She wasn't always this way. Not sure when she went mad. Left Kazdel to make a name for herself, came back looking like this.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Oh... Well, even so, she does look pretty nice.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What's the point of looking nice? Can't sell a thing if you just stand there all day.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: She sells baked dough too?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: As if. She makes jewelry out of garbage.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Some odd gewgaws too, like a transparent glass witchcraft orb with a model of Kazdel inside, or cups etched with strange patterns. It's all expensive, fragile stuff. Only a fool would buy any of it.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Heard she's got ornaments and statues on top of all that. Even less business on those. Can't get any use out of them most days, and so expensive too. Don't know what she's thinking.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Everyone around has been telling her, but she won't listen to a word of it.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Ahaha...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I don't think it's a bad thing, getting to see someone dressed up so pretty on the street every day.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I just hope she earns enough to feed herself... It'd be some terrible joke if she starved to death in front of my stall, right?
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: Hmm, I see where you're coming from... I'd better get going, see you.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Be seeing you, Nymph. Bring some friends next time.
attributes.name: Street Hawker

attributes.content: I will! Bye-bye!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: *phew*... Now that I'm full, I should get back to work.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: (She's so pretty...)
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: (Is that how they dress in Victoria? Those fabrics look really expensive.)
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: (And there's that brooch of hers with those purple and red gems...)
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: (Once I'm done with this job and I get my reward from Ermi, I'll go have a look at her stall!)
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Wait, there's one here?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: No way, there was no response just a moment ago.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Where is it, then?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Wait...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: That brooch with the purple and red gems...?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph feels a sudden tickle up her spine. She turns to look at the stall devoid of customers.
But no one is there. The behatted stall owner has long since packed up her wares and disappeared into the endless stream of people flowing through Kazdel.
Ermi, please pick up, it's urgent.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What now...?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: If she's only wearing all that jewelry because she's possessed, then she...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: There's no time. I'll go looking for her first.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hello, do you know where the lady who runs this stall went off to? The one wearing a suit and top hatâ€”
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Huh? A suit of what? Uh... She's wearing really strange clothes, and selling stuff no one wants to buy!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: She went that way? Okay, thank yâ€”The baked dough?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I got it from the stall over on the corner. Here, have some. If you like it, make sure you go to that stall!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I'm almost out of the city at this point. What did she come here for?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What's the detector say...? A very weak reaction, but it's here, alright.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I'll just have to check over everything.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It's here.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: A warehouse?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: She lives here?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: No way, why would someone wearing such nice clothes live here?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Maybe it's because of... the revenant fragment?!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I can't reach Ermi, and Pohl's looking for fragments somewhere else.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: C'mon, Nymph, think, think! There's got to be a way!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hypnosis, mental suggestion, Originium Arts... Maybe I could snatch it away?!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hello, young lady. Did you need me for something?
Sorry, let me think a bit longer...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Very good, ma'am.
Ah.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: H-Hello?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Crownie Mantel, Elegance Extraordinaire. A pleasure to meet you. Now, how may I be of service?
Could you sell me that brooch?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Because, because...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Because I really like it!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Well, I'm terribly sorry, ma'am, but it is not for sale.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Moreover, I'm afraid it's not suited to your ensemble.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: I have here an adornment much more appropriate for a rose such as yourself. If your need is dire, I could give it to you.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm only interested in the brooch.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph looks into Crownie's eyes. Her arms hang by her sides as her fingers sway lightly at an unusual frequency, tracing complex patterns in the air.
They are reflected in Crownie's pupils, but as she blinks, they are gently wiped away. It seems they have not dug deep into her heart as Nymph expected.
I'm afraid that's not possible.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: I will not part with this gem before finding a suitable replacement.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Now, I have some pressing business to attend to, so I'm afraid I cannot entertain you any longer. On your way now.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: (Waves staff)
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: (Chants softly)
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Please wait a moment, and hear my plea.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph projects her Arts with all her will, and they descend gently upon Crownie.
One second, two...
Her target continues to walk away.
...No effect?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: She's wearing the fragment. Getting around the revenant's influence on her sure isn't easy.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: This is a really stupid way to do it, but...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Forgive me, Madam Djall, but I'm in a hurry. Please don't block my way.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Ermi, please, please, please answer.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Ermi!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Arts don't work, I can't fight her, and I can't snatch it away.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: She's no normal hawker!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Just follow her for now, Nymph. Let's see where our ancestor wants to take her.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Even if something happens, I can at least give more info to Ermi.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It's not like she's going to go all the way out of the city, right?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: We're on the outskirts already. Where's she going?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Maybe she really is leaving the city?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I should contact the Liches at the gates, then. Ermi gave me their info. They should be able to get the fragment for me.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Eh? Where'd she go?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Wait, what?!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph watches as Crownie opens her own box, drawing out a hang glider from the depths within.
One hand grips the cane hooked onto the glider's frame, while the other holds the box tight. With her characteristic ramrod-straight figure dangling from the glider, she swoops off into the distance.
Can a revenant fragment really do all that?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I guess I should...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Forget it, Ermi's being awfully unreliable right now.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Wait, how about I...?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph hems and haws for a while as she watches the glider float away, but in the end, she makes up her mind.
She inserts the tip of her key into the keyhole on her staff. It breaks apart, turning into a swarm of keys surrounding her.
She grabs one and opens the bag at her waist, the keys immediately splitting into two groups as she does so.
One flock of keys attaches to her staff, rapidly spinning like a drone's rotor wing.
The others act as platforms under Nymph's feet, holding her aloft despite gravity's pull.
Standing in midair is an extremely strange experience.
Drifting off wherever the wind blows, watching the familiar sights behind slowly shrink away.
Until the jagged edges of Kazdel have faded into fuzziness under the gentle light of the sun.
Then, with the breeze in back and the wind aheadâ€”
A moment's distraction means tumbling to the ground.
AHHHHHH!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hah... Hah...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Here. Use my handkerchief to wipe your sweat.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Ah... Th-Thanks...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I must admit, I have never seen anyone act quite so recklessly. You are inexperienced with those Arts, are you not?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Y... Yes...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: If you hadn't flown by to catch me, I'd be a big splat on the ground.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Thank you for the hanky.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, don't mention it.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Do you always use your glider to leave the city?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It's quick, convenient and graceful. A most beautiful method of transportation. I was inspired by the cable cars plying Kjerag's snowy peaks.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: You've been to Kjerag?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I will have been one day, but for now, the pictures in the newspaper will suffice.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: You should head back home already, young Djall.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: What a strange ancestor... Why's he in such a hurry to leave Kazdel? And why bring Crownie along?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, there's no signal here...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Guess you're on your own, Nymph. Your big adventure begins here.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh thank goodness, she finally stopped.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It looks like she's not leaving Kazdel just yet.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: In the distance, Crownie takes a deep breath, then yells a strange... incantation?
'Come on out, Suffering!'
'Suffering'? Is that some kind of incantation?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It might be a name of a Sarkaz King. It wouldn't be strange for an ancient King to have a name like that.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: If you insist, old buddy.
Heheh, long time no see.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: A-A Sankta?!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: His plan involves a Sankta?!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What the heck is he up to?!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I can see you, little Djall.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: No need to hide behind a rock, come on out.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Why's your apprentice being such a stranger?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: She's not. I believe there might be some misunderstandings at play here. She has been following me for quite some time now.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: If you keep wandering around with that brooch on, I think your face'll end up on an arrest warrant real quick.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'll take it under advisement, Mostima.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: May I see the goods I ordered?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: But of course.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima gingerly places the box she is carrying between the two of them.
Three bolts of top-quality soft silk straight from Yan, just like you asked. Go ahead, inspect all you like.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: This... This is...
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: I can feel it...
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: This subtle push-back when you press down on it, this suppleness, this pure white...
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: I guess he really does want to leave Kazdel. He's even got a bunch of supplies ready.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Huh? Where'd that Sankta go?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Heya, little Djall. Nice weather today, isn't it?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: S-Stay back! I-I'm a caster! I've got really really super strong Arts!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Ooh, what a coincidence. As it turns out, I'm a caster too. Makes us counterparts, don't you think?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But you're... I'm...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It's fine, it's fine. You look reasonable enough, not the type to attack a defenseless Messenger like me for no reason.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'll take your silence as a good sign.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Crownie's gonna need a while longer to check out her haul, so I'll get some fresh air over here, maybe slack off a bit. Won't bother you at all. How's that sound?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So, you're a Messenger?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics. Guaranteed success.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Wanna try some Lateran candy?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Thanks... Then, you can have some of this.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Baked dough from Kazdel. Shame it's gone cold... It's really tasty when it's hot.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Well, don't mind if I do.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So... how do you know Crownie?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I probably shouldn't tell you. Client confidentiality and all. But... You sure you wanna listen to a Sankta story?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Who knows, I might weave a web of lies to snare your soul.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Go ahead. I can tell truth from lies.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: They say the Sankta are all awful and terrible, but... You haven't shot me with a gun yet, and you haven't tried to cut off my horns for a trophy on your belt.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Haha, alright. I'll start talking, then.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hmm... Where to begin?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: A few years ago, on a job in Ursus, I ran into a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Apparently, she couldn't stand life at home and decided to wander across the lands. By the time I met her, she had just managed to find a path she wanted to follow.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Ursus has real strict controls on a lot of things, so that Sarkaz needed people like us to get her the stuff she wanted.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Was Crownie a designer in Ursus?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: A designer? Heh, an Ursine hiring a Sarkaz to be an assistant is already a super-nice Ursine.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Y'know, the fashion brand that hired her was actually founded by a Sarkaz, but it got so crazy-popular in Ursus most people think it's local.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Even that fashion freak over there thought so at first. Anyway, she got the cold shoulder in Ursus, so after a bunch more wandering, she made her way back here.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: She must have made a lot of money before she came back.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Money? Hehe, shame I have to say it, but she's barely got two coins to rub together.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: When you look at her, well, you're seeing everything she's got, in a way.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The silk's perfect, Mostima!
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Then why's she buying cloth? I've seen where she lives, and the people around her. Maybe she's skipping meals to afford all this expensive stuff...?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Maybe she predicted that the Furnace would explode, and wanted the revenant to latch onto the fabric? No, that doesn't make any sense...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Wowee, that sounds serious.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I have no clue what you're talking about, but we should probably head on over. C'mon.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Need anything else, Crownie?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: My thanks, Mostima. You must have been through a lot, coming all this way.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Nah, just doing my job.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: As for further work, I would like some fabric from Sargon. I presume I will need to give full payment in advance, just as before?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: I mean, sure, but I don't think you'll be needing my services much longer.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What ever do you mean? Is your company changing its modus operandi?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: No, don't get the wrong idea here.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What I mean isâ€”
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: This sort of stuff will be sold in Kazdel soon enough, so you won't need Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Is that so...?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: The number of caravans going in and out of Kazdel has doubled several times over. The folks at Rhodes Island have also helped set up a few connections for the city.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You'll probably have a place you can get imported goods before long.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So you're saying... I will be able to sell my Kazdelian souvenirs?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Your what?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Crystal balls, cups... You know, souvenirs you'd get on a trip. Not that different to the ones you see in other countries, they're just Kazdel-themed.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: But who would want to go on vacation to Kazdel? We don't really have any good sightseeing spots.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I wouldn't mind, to be honest. Walk around, see your Soul Furnace, roam the streets, and there's that 'Temple of Knowledge'... That's in Kazdel, right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: *sigh* Shame I won't get the chance. Your idea's not bad, though. You should talk to the merchants. They might want to buy some souvenirs to show off back home.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'll bear it in mind. My thanks. As for you, young Djall...
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Call me Nymph.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Let us go, Madam Nymph. We should hurry on home.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Okay. Well, see you, Sankta Messenger lady!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Ciao. If you ever need anything, remember to call Penguin Logistics. Crownie's got our contact.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Phew... Shouldn't you have popped out too, 'Suffering'? Or is it 'Mad Bomber' these days?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Have you lost your mind? Coming to Kazdel just for a delivery?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: If you get caught by the Sarkaz, there's no way you're making it out alive.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: She's an old customer. Not wise to refuse a request.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What, worried about me?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Supervising you is my job. We're going back right now. Immediately.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Not like there's anywhere to run in this wasteland anyway. Say, why don't we go have some fun in Kazdel for a day?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: (Raises weapon) ...Start walking.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: *sigh* It's so hard to get through to you.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Welcome to my humble abode.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: After an entire day of walking, Nymph and Crownie are back in front of the warehouse where they first spoke.
The place that Nymph assumed the revenant compelled Crownie to go to avoid the crowd.
(She really does live here.)
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: (There's a bed, a workbench, some clothes hung up, a corner full of junk. She's missing a lot of basic furniture.)
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: When you look at her, well, you're seeing everything she's got, in a way.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Please, make yourself at home.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Sure...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Do you need help, Crownie?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: No. I can handle things on my own.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: That cloth you bought is really expensive.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: A mere several months' worth of food, hardly important.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Hmm, this place is ill-suited for a brooch. If I use this cloth to make a matching necktie or cravat...
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Madam Nymph.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You wanted this brooch, did you not?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Eh? Yeah.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: But didn't youâ€”
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Take it. I no longer have need of it.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: A heavy stillness emanates from the brooch, and Nymph cannot stop herself from shivering. She quickly throws the fragment-embedded jewelry into her box.
This whole time, the revenant fragment seems to have done nothing other than latch onto the brooch.
No commanding strange creations, no instigating arguments in a crowd.
When he was in the palm of her hand, she even felt some fury and frustration coming from him, like...
...Talking to a burdenbeast?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Pardon?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Oh, no, it's nothing, just a funny idea that popped into my head... Are you feeling alright, Crownie?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Thank you for your concern, but I've been fit as a fiddle this entire time.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: (She doesn't sound any different from earlier. Has she really recovered from it?)
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: If there's anything I can do to help, don't hesitate to ask.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hmm... As it were, Madam Nymph, I do have a presumptuous request.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Just Nymph is fine, no need to be so formal.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Very well then, Nymph. Could you come here for a moment?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Nymph looks at the clothes atop Crownie's workbench. They appear to be a suit, but not in Crownie's size.
Could you try this on?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Crownie whips out a tape measure, rapidly taking Nymph's measurements while muttering strings of numbers to herself.
It should fit you. Give it a try.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Aren't these clothes really expensive? I'm scared I'llâ€”
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Don't worry. It's not finished yet.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Alright, then.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: H-How do I look?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Beautiful.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: How is the fit? Are the cuffs too tight? Too loose? Anywhere that feels particularly awkward?
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: No, it's a perfect fit...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Are you making these clothes for a friend?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: No. It is a gift to myself.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: This outfit's creation is my dream, but alas, I am still unable to realize it.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: I think it's pretty much perfect already.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Far from it, I'm afraid. The cuffs still need embellishment, the accessories still need matching. All in all, still rather crude...
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: You may take it off now, Nymph. My thanks.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Oh, okay.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: But why would you make an outfit you can't wear?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Because its revelation gave my life direction.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: I wanted to distinguish my life from those of others, but I too love this city. And so, I called attention to myself through a multitude of methods, old Sarkaz tricks all. I'm sure you'll understand where I'm coming from.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: In the end, I was driven away from Kazdel, set adrift in the wilds.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: I was offered menial work in Ursus. At first, it was only my survival instinct that spurred me to accept.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: But I found myself rather suited to deft needlework. More importantly, I obtained a designer's manuscript.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: A Sarkaz designer from Kazdel. Kazdel, designer. Never had I thought those two words could fit together.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Were these clothes in that manuscript?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: They were. It was a heavily damaged book, and much information was lost, save for a note reading 'for AM' and the framework of this suit. Naught else remained.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Despite the damage, it provoked an emotion I had never felt before.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: In order to understand it, I took up tailoring, alongside the crafting of many other knick-knacks.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: As it happened, Kazdel had forgotten me by that point. And so I returned, under a new identity.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Kazdel has changed, just as I have. It's a more tolerant city these days. Even a stuck-out nail such as I can find a stage here.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Is that why you made stuff you can't sell?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: They are souvenirs. There will come a day that Kazdel will entertain visitors from all across Terra. This, I do believe.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Though I am merely testing the waters on a whim, if other places can enjoy something, then why not Kazdel? We are not so different from them.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: It could be a suit of fashionable clothes, a set of baubles for tourists, or even... a way of life. The pursuit of beauty.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: You might be thinking too far ahead. I've never even dreamed of Kazdel being a tourist attraction!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You're right that the city has changed lately, though. There's lots of people walking around, and it's real lively these days. Completely different from before.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Did you see the fireworks a few nights ago? They were so pretty! Maybe the Furnace got a bit too happy and lively, and that's why it fired them off.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph, what's going on?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Everything's fine now, Ermi. Ran into some trouble while I was trying to get the fragment, but they're all taken care of.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Good to hear. I was helping the oldâ€” *cough* aiding my master in some research on phylactery, so I didn't catch your calls. Terribly sorry about that.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: It's fine, I've covered most of the city by now. There's just one newly-repaired residential district left to check. I might be finished by tomorrow, so you'd better get that reward ready!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Once you're done, come right over and it's all yours. You're a lifesaver.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: I'll be turning in early tonight. Goodbye.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Sure, see you soon, Ermi.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Well, I won't trouble you any longer, Crownie. If anything comes up, remember to come find me. Here's my contact.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I will, thank you. Good night, Nymph.
attributes.name: Crownie

attributes.content: Good night.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hah... I'm so tired...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I never got to eat any of that baked dough I bought this morning.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: *munch*
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hmm... I think if I warm it up once I get home, it'll taste a lot better.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Pohl! How did you find me?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You walked up to the city gates and flew off the walls. The information brokers've been chatting about you pretty much all day.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Did you find anything?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nope. No signs of fragment influence around the Military Commission garrison or settlement.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: You found something yourself, didn't you?
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Yeah! Look! The fragment I found today is super pretty! It's like a gem!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It's a piece of glass from inside the furnace, looks like. You're right though, that color is really distinctive.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: The lady who gave it to me was really distinctive too!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Today's been real hard on me, though. I was running around all day, and now I'm hungry and tired, haaah...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Go home and get some rest already. Just one residential district left to check. Gotta do all we can to get everything wrapped up tomorrow.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Damn, you're so tired you nearly smacked your head against the wall... Fine, I'll walk you home.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Don't fall asleep just yet. Tell me about this 'distinctive lady' you met.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Sure... I went to the market this morning to buy...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Some baked dough, which smelled real nice...
attributes.name: Nymph
